content:
I apologize for the confusion. You are correct that the Champion 2000-Watt Ultralight Portable Inverter Generator does not have a remote start capability. I apologize for the mistake in my previous response.

However, there are other portable generators with similar power output and remote start capabilities. For example, the Westinghouse iGen2200 Portable Inverter Generator has a maximum output of 2200 watts and features a remote start capability using a key fob. Another option is the WEN 56200i Super Quiet 2000-Watt Portable Inverter Generator, which also has a maximum output of 2000 watts and features a remote start capability using a remote control.

Again, I apologize for the error in my previous response and I hope this information helps you find the generator that meets your needs.
